alert.note: Alert for Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 7:47PM MST until February 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW AND STRONG WINDS EXPECTED INTO TONIGHT... .A winter storm will continue to impact the area tonight, bringing heavy snow to portions of the northern Black Hills and foothills, along with much of northeastern Wyoming. On the northwestern and west central South Dakota plains, strong winds and snow will lead to slippery roads and reduced visibilities causing travel difficulties. Snow is expected to taper off from northwest to southeast this evening into tonight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In South Dakota, the Northern Foot Hills and the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills. In Wyoming, Northern Campbell County and Western Crook County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
